column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Second time in Chicago
column2: first time at Lou's. I would definitely come back. The deep dish pizza exceeded my expectations. We got the classic Chicago and added pepperoni and green peppers. I always heard there were very long lines and the wait time could be anywhere up to an hour. We came on a Thursday right before 6pm and it was the perfect time! No wait whatsoever. Our waitress was very nice and attentive and the restaurant had a rustic vibe to it. The pizza was AMAZING. TASTY. The pizza slice held everything so well and did not fall apart. The crust was buttery
column4: yet sturdy. Everyone must try when in Chi-town!
